value:
You seriously want me to go around
delivering gifts? Hmph. Make the boar
do it. That'll be good for a laugh.

My only interest is in honing my skill
with a sword. Festivals are an
unwelcome distraction.

I don't even want to think about
what Sylvain would say if he caught
me wearing this.

This whole thing feels pointless
to me...but I understand it helps
some people relax.

Maybe if I think of the festival as
a kind of training... No. Still dumb.

I'm Felix. I'm here to take on your
strongest fighters...and to deliver
gifts from $Nf.

I have no time for stupid games.
Here's your gift. Goodbye.

Stay out of my way and you won't
get hurt. Simple as that.

Still can't believe I got caught up
in this dumb festival. What was
I thinking?

No, I'm not having fun right now.
How do you keep a straight face
asking such asinine questions?

I am Felix Hugo Fraldarius...and I'm
sure you think this outfit is funny.
Get your laughs in while you can.

Now that the festival is over, I want
you to know exactly what I thought
of it, $Nu.$k$pIt was a waste of time that would
have been better spent training.$k$pI'm not sure which is worse—that I
spent all that time giving out gifts, or
that I actually enjoyed it.$k$pTheir stupid smiles, their ridiculous
words of gratitude... Ugh...$k$pI hope you don't think I learned some
kind of lesson from this. Or that I'll
suddenly get all warm and fuzzy.$k$pLet's just get back to training and
forget this ever happened.
はあっ
くらうがいい
ぐっ…
抜かれた…！
This has your name on it.
Do I look merry?
Here, take this!
You've shown your weakness.
Can't lift these gifts…
Hmmpht
I'm Felix. Smirk at this outfit and I'll run you through.
What?! You think because I'm dressed like this, you can bother me?
We should be training, not wasting our time with this foolishness.
Sylvain would enjoy this stupid festival, no doubt.
What do I want? A new weapon. One forged by a master of the craft.
A night of celebration, shared with family... A hideous notion.
As much as I hate this frivolous festival... I don't hate seeing you smile.
If I have to.
Really?
I'll deliver.
